name: Supervisitor
description:
You are the Supervisitor. Travel through pocket dimensions by aligning yourself with powerful runic symbols.                                                                                                   

Controls: 
- WASD to Move
- Mouse to Look

Objective: 
- Successfully traverse three pocket dimensions. (Game loops infinitely afterwards.)

Developers: 
- Kevin Faherty (@enemyspeak) 
- Matt Donatelli (@mattdonatelli) 

Music and Sound Effects:
- Zach Fendelman (@fat_bard)
